site_name: Puppys R Us L L C

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on 21
September 2022.
Inspector honked, vehicle horn knocked on door, called number provided; owner stated they would not be home until the
weekend
End Section
